
{{alias}}( s1, s2 )
    Calculates the Hamming code points distance between two equal-length
    unicode code points.

    The function returns a sentinel value of -1 if the input string lengths
    differ.

    Parameters
    ----------
    s1: string
        First input string.

    s2: string
        Second input string.

    Returns
    -------
    out: number
        Hamming code points distance.

    Examples
    --------
    > var d = {{alias}}( "Hello, world!", "HÃ©llÃ¶, wÃ¶rld!" )
    3
    > d = {{alias}}( "aðŸ˜Šc", "aðŸ˜ƒc" )
    1
    > d = {{alias}}( "ã“ã‚“ã«ã¡ã¯", "ã•ã‚ˆã†ãªã‚‰" )
    5
    > d = {{alias}}( "a", "abcissa" )
    -1

    See Also
    --------
